$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

add_request_id.description: Whether to automatically add a `request_id` field to any request with a JSON body and no pre-existing `request_id` field

attempts.description: Number of attempts to query when experiencing a retryable error like a timeout

connect_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to allow for establishing a connection.  Use 0 for no timeout.

read_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to allow for a request to complete after establishing a connection.  Use 0 for no timeout.
